author: jefft
msg: Rename 'name' to 'proj.jar.name', to avoid a bug in Ant 1.5, where the name
property is inherited, despite inheritAll="false". The symptom of this was jar
names like avalon-threadcontext.jar-1.0.jar, causing depchecking failures

author: jefft
msg: Add checks to ensure that logkit.jar was compiled with required optional bits.
This stops the build failing if, say, logkit.jar was compiled without servlet
support, but Excalibur Logger wants it enabled.

author: proyal
msg: Enable ConfigurationValidator to be reached via JMX
